contact-me-if-you-want-to-have-credentia: If you don't have any login details yet, you can also contact me and ask for your personal login details.

enter-the-page-as-guest: Before you continue as a guest, one more important piece of information.

here-you-can-find-all-relevant-documents: You can find all relevant documents here

login-page.guest-explanation: If you have not yet received any data from me, you can simply continue as a guest and browse through my portfolio.
login-page.login-explanation: For data protection reasons, some information is only available if you are logged in. You will receive the login details from me by e-mail.
login-page.welcome-explanation:
Welcome to my digital portfolio. Here you will find all the latest information about me.

Log in or continue as a guest.

my-milestones-snap-scroll-description: Here you can see all the milestones I have already achieved.
my-tech-stack-snap-scroll-description: Here you can find an overview of my tech stack. The skill rating shows how well I can do something.
name: Name
no-file-found-that-match-your-search-cri: No files could be found that match your search.
please-confirm-that-you-have-read-the-pr: Please confirm that you have read the privacy policy and agree with its content.
private-files-can-only-be-seen-by-logged: This file can only be viewed and downloaded by registered users.
professional-experience: {count} year of professional experience | {count} years of professional experience
search-by-name-or-tag: You can also search for tags!
snap-scroll-setting-explanation: This view serves to simplify the presentation of information with a less complex design and enables better operation on smaller displays.
some-information-are-unavailable-for-gue:
Some information is not (fully) available if you continue as a guest. If you have login details, I recommend that you log in now.

You can always log in later via the menu at the top right once you have entered the portfolio.
you-need-to-be-logged-in-to-download-or-: Guests are not able to view and download some attachments.
